input_schema.description: Input schema for batch Maya-1-Voice TTS generation

top_p.title: Top P
top_p.description: Nucleus sampling parameter for all generations.

output_format.description: Output audio format for all generated speech files
output_format.title: Output Format

texts.description: List of texts to synthesize into speech. You can embed emotion tags in each text using the format <emotion_name>.
texts.title: Texts

prompts.description: List of voice descriptions for each text. Must match the length of texts list. Each describes the voice/character attributes.
prompts.title: Prompts

sample_rate.description: Output audio sample rate for all generations. 48 kHz provides higher quality, 24 kHz is faster.
sample_rate.title: Sample Rate

input_schema.title: MayaVoiceBatchInput

output_schema.description: Output schema for batch Maya-1-Voice TTS generation

average_rtf.description: Average real-time factor across all generations
average_rtf.title: Average Rtf

sample_rate.description: Sample rate of all generated audio files
sample_rate.title: Sample Rate

total_generation_time.description: Total time taken to generate all audio files in seconds
total_generation_time.title: Total Generation Time

durations.description: Duration of each generated audio in seconds
durations.title: Durations

output_schema.title: MayaVoiceBatchOutput

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url
